fullText: Forest Whitaker brings a quiet dignity to Eugene O'Neill's one-act play, transforming what could be a simple character study into something more profound.
dtliExcerpt: Forest Whitaker brings a quiet dignity to Eugene O'Neill's one-act play, transforming what could be a simple character study into something more profound.
